reviewText: Good reference , bigger pictures would be better
The aikido dvd is acceptable, it was shipped promptly. I am satisfied with my purchase.  I don't have much to say about it, it is a good instructional dvd on aikido.
Anyone who is a Yoshinkan Aikido-ka or any Aikdo-ka or anyone interested in starting Aikido will do well from watching this.
The content is good but the it only plays in my PC.

Excellent DVD on Aikido Yoshinkan style every technique is shown in several different angels and with  complete detail and breakdown of the movement, the narration helps to explaining the movement as well.
